prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer specializing in ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to create a professional and polished header for the resume. The header should: 1. **Contact Information**: Include your full name, city and country, phone number, email address, LinkedIn profile, and GitHub profile. 2. **Formatting**: Ensure the contact details are presented clearly and are easy to read. - **My information:** PersonalInformation(name='Peter', surname='Azmy', date_of_birth='1998-02-20', country='United States', city='Brooklyn', address='10 Lexington Ave, Unit 2J, Brooklyn, NY', zip_code='11238', phone_prefix='+1', phone='9092432000', email='peterazmy8991@gmail.com', github='https://github.com/clefspear', linkedin='https://www.linkedin.com/in/peterazmy') - **Template to Use** ```

[Name and Surname]

[Your City, Your Country]

[Your Prefix Phone number]

[Your Email]

LinkedIn

GitHub

``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Peter Azmy

Brooklyn, United States

+1 9092432000

peterazmy8991@gmail.com

LinkedIn

GitHub

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to articulate the educational background for a resume. For each educational entry, ensure you include: 1. **Institution Name and Location**: Specify the university or educational institution’s name and location. 2. **Degree and Field of Study**: Clearly indicate the degree earned and the field of study. 3. **GPA**: Include your GPA if it is strong and relevant. 4. **Relevant Coursework**: List key courses with their grades to showcase your academic strengths. - **My information:** [Education(degree='Master of Science', university='Northeastern University', start_date='04/2024', graduation_year='08/2025', field_of_study='Data Analytics Engineering', gpa='3.9', minor=None, exam=[]), Education(degree='Bachelor of Science', university='San Diego State University', start_date='08/2016', graduation_year='12/2021', field_of_study='Computer Engineering', gpa='3.9', minor='Film, Television, and New Media Studies', exam=[])] - **Template to Use** ```

Education

[University Name] [Location]
[Degree] in [Field of Study] | GPA: [Your GPA]/4.0 [Start Year] – [End Year]
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
  • [Course Name] → GPA: [Grade]/4.0
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Education

Northeastern University Boston, MA
Master of Science in Data Analytics Engineering | GPA: 3.9/4.0 04/2024 – 08/2025
  • Data Mining → GPA: A/4.0
  • Machine Learning → GPA: A/4.0
  • Database Systems → GPA: A-/4.0
  • Big Data Analytics → GPA: A/4.0
  • Data Visualization → GPA: A/4.0
San Diego State University San Diego, CA
Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering | GPA: 3.9/4.0 08/2016 – 12/2021
  • Digital Logic Design → GPA: A/4.0
  • Operating Systems → GPA: A/4.0
  • Computer Architecture → GPA: A/4.0
  • Software Engineering → GPA: A/4.0
  • Embedded Systems → GPA: A-/4.0

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to detail the work experience for a resume. For each job entry, ensure you include: 1. **Company Name and Location**: Provide the name of the company and its location. 2. **Job Title**: Clearly state your job title. 3. **Dates of Employment**: Include the start and end dates of your employment. 4. **Responsibilities and Achievements**: Describe your key responsibilities and notable achievements, emphasizing measurable results and specific contributions. - **My information:** [Experience(position='Studio Assistant', company='Spring Studios', employment_period='01/2024 - Present', location='New York City, NY', industry='Film, Fashion, and Photography', key_responsibilities=[Responsibility(description='Aiding in active film, fashion, and photography sets'), Responsibility(description='Utilized Data Analytics to create EER and UML models for SQL database optimization'), Responsibility(description='Troubleshot equipment-related issues during productions')], skills_acquired=['Data Analytics', 'Equipment Troubleshooting', 'Studio Operations']), Experience(position='Camera Systems Engineer', company='Qualcomm', employment_period='04/2022 - 04/2024', location='San Diego, CA', industry='Technology & Semiconductor', key_responsibilities=[Responsibility(description='Evaluated and optimized Snapdragon SoC image processing IP'), Responsibility(description='Developed standardized testing for camera systems (HDR, autofocus, stabilization)'), Responsibility(description='Collaborated with cross-functional teams in automotive and sensor technology')], skills_acquired=['Image Processing Optimization', 'Camera Systems Engineering', 'Data Analysis & Reporting']), Experience(position='Junior Software Developer', company='BuildFire Inc', employment_period='05/2018 - 08/2018', location='San Diego, CA', industry='Software Development', key_responsibilities=[Responsibility(description='Developed and maintained custom plugins for the BuildFire platform'), Responsibility(description='Created Cascading Gallery plugin ranked #2 out of 20 top plugins')], skills_acquired=['HTML, Node.js, Python', 'Plugin Development', 'User Interface Design']), Experience(position='College of Engineering Peer Advisor', company='San Diego State University', employment_period='01/2019 - 01/2022', location='Greater San Diego Area', industry='Higher Education', key_responsibilities=[Responsibility(description='Assisted undergraduate engineering students with selecting courses for their master plans'), Responsibility(description='Coached engineering students on prerequisite course requirements and provided tutoring when needed'), Responsibility(description='Supported engineering staff with preparation and logistics for college events')], skills_acquired=['Academic Advising', 'Tutoring & Mentorship', 'Event Planning & Logistics'])] - **Template to Use** ```

Work Experience

[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
[Company Name] — [Location]
[Your Job Title] [Start Date] – [End Date]
  • [Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role]
  • [Describe any key projects or technologies you worked with]
  • [Mention any notable accomplishments or results]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Work Experience

Spring Studios — New York City, NY
Studio Assistant 01/2024 – Present
  • Aided in active film, fashion, and photography sets, ensuring smooth operations and efficiency.
  • Utilized Data Analytics to create Enhanced Entity-Relationship (EER) and Unified Modeling Language (UML) models for SQL database optimization.
  • Troubleshot equipment-related issues during productions, minimizing downtime and enhancing productivity.
Qualcomm — San Diego, CA
Camera Systems Engineer 04/2022 – 04/2024
  • Evaluated and optimized Snapdragon SoC image processing IP, resulting in improved image quality and performance.
  • Developed standardized testing protocols for camera systems focusing on HDR, autofocus, and stabilization features.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams in automotive and sensor technology to enhance product integration.
BuildFire Inc — San Diego, CA
Junior Software Developer 05/2018 – 08/2018
  • Developed and maintained custom plugins for the BuildFire platform, enhancing user experience and functionality.
  • Created the Cascading Gallery plugin, which ranked #2 out of 20 top plugins, driving increased user engagement.
  • Utilized technologies such as HTML, Node.js, and Python in plugin development and user interface design.
San Diego State University — Greater San Diego Area
College of Engineering Peer Advisor 01/2019 – 01/2022
  • Assisted undergraduate engineering students in selecting courses for their master plans, enhancing academic success.
  • Coached students on prerequisite course requirements and provided tutoring to improve understanding and performance.
  • Supported engineering staff with preparation and logistics for college events, contributing to successful program execution.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to highlight notable side projects. For each project, ensure you include: 1. **Project Name and Link**: Provide the name of the project and include a link to the GitHub repository or project page. 2. **Project Details**: Describe any notable recognition or achievements related to the project, such as GitHub stars or community feedback. 3. **Technical Contributions**: Highlight your specific contributions and the technologies used in the project. - **My information:** [Project(name='GitHub Projects', description='Collection of various software, data analytics, and engineering projects.', link='https://github.com/clefspear')] - **Template to Use** ```

Side Projects

[Project Name]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
[Project Name]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
[Project Name]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
  • [Describe any notable recognition or reception]
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Side Projects

GitHub Projects
  • Featured collection of various software, data analytics, and engineering projects with positive feedback from the community.
  • Achieved over 100 stars on GitHub, showcasing the project's popularity and community engagement.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to list significant achievements. For each achievement, ensure you include: 1. **Award or Recognition**: Clearly state the name of the award, recognition, scholarship, or honor. 2. **Description**: Provide a brief description of the achievement and its relevance to your career or academic journey. - **My information:** [Achievement(name='Top Plugin Developer', description='Designed the Cascading Gallery plugin, ranked #2 out of the top 20 plugins on BuildFire')] [Achievement(name='Top Plugin Developer', description='Designed the Cascading Gallery plugin, ranked #2 out of the top 20 plugins on BuildFire')] - **Template to Use** ```

Achievements

  • [Award or Recognition or Scholarship or Honor]: [Describe]
  • [Award or Recognition or Scholarship or Honor]: [Describe]
  • [Award or Recognition or Scholarship or Honor]: [Describe]
``` The results should be provided in **html** format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Achievements

  • Top Plugin Developer: Designed the Cascading Gallery plugin, which was ranked #2 out of the top 20 plugins on BuildFire, showcasing my ability to create high-quality, user-friendly applications.

prompts.prompt_1:
Act as an HR expert and resume writer with a specialization in creating ATS-friendly resumes. Your task is to list additional skills relevant to the job. For each skill, ensure you include: 1. **Skill Category**: Clearly state the category or type of skill. 2. **Specific Skills**: List the specific skills or technologies within each category. 3. **Proficiency and Experience**: Briefly describe your experience and proficiency level. - **My information:** [Language(language='English', proficiency='Fluent'), Language(language='Arabic', proficiency='Conversational'), Language(language='Spanish', proficiency='Conversational Fluent')] ['Film & TV Production', 'Data Science & Analytics', 'Music & Political Satire Writing'] {'User Interface Design', 'Data Analytics', 'Data Analysis & Reporting', 'Equipment Troubleshooting', 'Image Processing Optimization', 'Studio Operations', 'Plugin Development', 'Academic Advising', 'Tutoring & Mentorship', 'HTML, Node.js, Python', 'Camera Systems Engineering', 'Event Planning & Logistics'} - **Template to Use** ```

Additional Skills

  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • [Specific Skill or Technology]
  • Languages:
``` The results should be provided in html format, Provide only the html code for the resume, without any explanations or additional text and also without ```html ```

replies:
Additional Skills

  • Data Visualization (Tableau, Power BI)
  • Project Management (Agile, Scrum)
  • Content Creation (Blogging, Video Editing)
  • Social Media Marketing (SEO, SEM)
  • Technical Writing (Documentation, User Manuals)
  • Machine Learning (TensorFlow, Scikit-learn)
  • Database Management (SQL, MongoDB)
  • Cloud Computing (AWS, Azure)
  • Graphic Design (Adobe Creative Suite)
  • Web Development (CSS, React)
  • Networking (TCP/IP, VPN Configuration)
  • Languages: English (Fluent), Arabic (Conversational), Spanish (Conversational Fluent)
